    <script>
        // ã‚«ãƒ†ã‚´ãƒªãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ«ã‚¿ãƒ¼æ©Ÿèƒ½
        const filterBtns = document.querySelectorAll('.filter-btn');
        const campaignCards = document.querySelectorAll('.campaign-card');

        filterBtns.forEach(btn => {
            btn.addEventListener('click', () => {
                // ã‚¢ã‚¯ãƒ†ã‚£ãƒ–ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³ã®åˆ‡ã‚Šæ›¿ãˆ
                filterBtns.forEach(b => b.classList.remove('active'));
                btn.classList.add('active');

                const category = btn.dataset.category;

                // ã‚«ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã®ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ«ã‚¿ãƒªãƒ³ã‚°
                campaignCards.forEach(card => {
                    if (category === 'all' || card.dataset.category === category) {
                        card.classList.remove('hidden');
                    } else {
                        card.classList.add('hidden');
                    }
                });
            });
        });

        // ã‚«ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚¯ãƒªãƒƒã‚¯ã§ãƒªãƒ³ã‚¯ã‚’é–‹ã
        campaignCards.forEach(card => {
            card.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
                if (e.target.tagName !== 'A') {
                    const link = card.querySelector('.campaign-link');
                    if (link) {
                        window.open(link.href, '_blank');
                    }
                }
            });
        });

        // ã‚¹ãƒ ãƒ¼ã‚ºã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã®æ”¹å–„
        document.querySelectorAll('a[href^="#"]').forEach(anchor => {
            anchor.addEventListener('click', function (e) {
                e.preventDefault();
                const target = document.querySelector(this.getAttribute('href'));
                if (target) {
                    target.scrollIntoView({
                        behavior: 'smooth',
                        block: 'start'
                    });
                }
            });
        });
    </script>

+         // é«˜åº¦ãªæ¤œç´¢ãƒ»ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ«ã‚¿ãƒ¼æ©Ÿèƒ½
+         class CampaignDashboard {
+             constructor() {
+                 this.searchInput = document.getElementById('searchInput');
+                 this.filterTabs = document.querySelectorAll('.filter-tab');
+                 this.campaignCards = document.querySelectorAll('.campaign-card');
+                 this.currentFilter = 'all';
+                 this.currentSearch = '';
+                 
+                 this.init();
+             }
+             
+             init() {
+                 this.setupSearch();
+                 this.setupFilters();
+                 this.setupCardInteractions();
+                 this.setupAnimations();
+             }
+             
+             setupSearch() {
+                 this.searchInput.addEventListener('input', (e) => {
+                     this.currentSearch = e.target.value.toLowerCase();
+                     this.filterCampaigns();
+                 });
+             }
+             
+             setupFilters() {
+                 this.filterTabs.forEach(tab => {
+                     tab.addEventListener('click', () => {
+                         // ã‚¢ã‚¯ãƒ†ã‚£ãƒ–ã‚¿ãƒ–ã®åˆ‡ã‚Šæ›¿ãˆ
+                         this.filterTabs.forEach(t => t.classList.remove('active'));
+                         tab.classList.add('active');
+                         
+                         this.currentFilter = tab.dataset.category;
+                         this.filterCampaigns();
+                     });
+                 });
+             }
+             
+             setupCardInteractions() {
+                 this.campaignCards.forEach(card => {
+                     card.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
+                         if (e.target.tagName !== 'A' && !e.target.closest('a')) {
+                             const link = card.querySelector('.campaign-link');
+                             if (link) {
+                                 // ã‚¢ãƒ‹ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ä»˜ãã§ãƒªãƒ³ã‚¯ã‚’é–‹ã
+                                 card.style.transform = 'scale(0.98)';
+                                 setTimeout(() => {
+                                     window.open(link.href, '_blank');
+                                     card.style.transform = '';
+                                 }, 150);
+                             }
+                         }
+                     });
+                     
+                     // ãƒ›ãƒãƒ¼ã‚¨ãƒ•ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆã®å¼·åŒ–
+                     card.addEventListener('mouseenter', () => {
+                         card.style.transform = 'translateY(-8px) scale(1.02)';
+                     });
+                     
+                     card.addEventListener('mouseleave', () => {
+                         card.style.transform = '';
+                     });
+                 });
+             }
+             
+             setupAnimations() {
+                 // ã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ«æ™‚ã®ã‚¢ãƒ‹ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³
+                 const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
+                     entries.forEach(entry => {
+                         if (entry.isIntersecting) {
+                             entry.target.style.opacity = '1';
+                             entry.target.style.transform = 'translateY(0)';
+                         }
+                     });
+                 }, { threshold: 0.1 });
+                 
+                 this.campaignCards.forEach(card => {
+                     card.style.opacity = '0';
+                     card.style.transform = 'translateY(30px)';
+                     card.style.transition = 'all 0.6s ease';
+                     observer.observe(card);
+                 });
+             }
+             
+             filterCampaigns() {
+                 this.campaignCards.forEach(card => {
+                     const category = card.dataset.category;
+                     const title = card.querySelector('.campaign-title').textContent.toLowerCase();
+                     const description = card.querySelector('.campaign-description').textContent.toLowerCase();
+                     
+                     const matchesCategory = this.currentFilter === 'all' || category === this.currentFilter;
+                     const matchesSearch = this.currentSearch === '' || 
+                         title.includes(this.currentSearch) || 
+                         description.includes(this.currentSearch);
+                     
+                     if (matchesCategory && matchesSearch) {
+                         card.classList.remove('hidden');
+                         card.style.display = 'block';
+                         // ã‚¢ãƒ‹ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ä»˜ãã§è¡¨ç¤º
+                         setTimeout(() => {
+                             card.style.opacity = '1';
+                             card.style.transform = 'translateY(0)';
+                         }, 100);
+                     } else {
+                         card.style.opacity = '0';
+                         card.style.transform = 'translateY(20px)';
+                         setTimeout(() => {
+                             card.classList.add('hidden');
+                             card.style.display = 'none';
+                         }, 300);
+                     }
+                 });
+                 
+                 // çµæœã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆã®æ›´æ–°
+                 this.updateResultCount();
+             }
+             
+             updateResultCount() {
+                 const visibleCards = Array.from(this.campaignCards).filter(card => 
+                     !card.classList.contains('hidden')
+                 );
+                 
+                 // ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ«ã‚¿ãƒ¼ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆã®æ›´æ–°
+                 this.filterTabs.forEach(tab => {
+                     const category = tab.dataset.category;
+                     const count = category === 'all' ? 
+                         this.campaignCards.length : 
+                         Array.from(this.campaignCards).filter(card => 
+                             card.dataset.category === category
+                         ).length;
+                     
+                     const countElement = tab.querySelector('.filter-count');
+                     if (countElement) {
+                         countElement.textContent = count;
+                     }
+                 });
+             }
+         }
+         
+         // ãƒ€ãƒƒã‚·ãƒ¥ãƒœãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã®åˆæœŸåŒ–
+         document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
+             new CampaignDashboard();
+         });
+         
+         // ãƒ‘ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ã‚¹æœ€é©åŒ–
+         let ticking = false;
+         
+         function updateOnScroll() {
+             if (!ticking) {
+                 requestAnimationFrame(() => {
+                     // ã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ«æ™‚ã®å‡¦ç†
+                     ticking = false;
+                 });
+                 ticking = true;
+             }
+         }
+         
+         window.addEventListener('scroll', updateOnScroll, { passive: true });
+         
+         // ã‚­ãƒ¼ãƒœãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ¼ãƒˆã‚«ãƒƒãƒˆ
+         document.addEventListener('keydown', (e) => {
+             if (e.ctrlKey || e.metaKey) {
+                 switch(e.key) {
+                     case 'f':
+                         e.preventDefault();
+                         document.getElementById('searchInput').focus();
+                         break;
+                     case '1':
